head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths KREISBERG, MONROE N.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths KREISBERG, MONROE N.

block.p: KREISBERG-Monroe N. Loving, loveable, gentle and wise. Story teller extraordinaire; trusted attorney; never to be forgotten. Beloved husband of Rita (nee Hoffer). Very devoted father of Stephanie and Michael Sporn and Jonathan and Mary Anne Kreisberg. Dear brother of Adele Pasahow, Sabina Brown and Gerald and Stanley Kreisberg. Adoring grandfather of Jamie, Jeremy, Kara and Jay. Service today, 10:30 AM at Temple Beth Sholom, 100 72nd St and Northern Blvd., Flushing.
